ComicInfo.Summary:
In Un/Sacred Vol 2, Mirka and her special guests invite you once again into the world of Angelina and Damiano…and Eden, the new arrival in the family! Issue 4 features the story of Damiano’s band getting back together, a day in the life of Angelina’s school teaching adventures, and more…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Olivier Vatine | 1 | B | Cover B (Eden in the Middle) | Mirka Andolfo | 2 | C | Cover C (Angelina Damiano Make Out Pencl) | Mirka Andolfo | 3 | D | Cover D | Elisa Ferrari | 4 | E | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Virgin Cover E | Mirka Andolfo | 5 | F | 1:20 Retailer Incentive Black & White Virgin Cover F | Elisa Ferrari | 6 | G | 1:30 Retailer Incentive Negative Art Cover G | Mirka Andolfo | 7 |
